title: Faye Tozer Acts in Mean Girls Musical
summary: Faye Tozer is a singer and actress who will be in the Mean Girls musical. She will play three different characters: the moms of Cady and Regina, and a math teacher. The musical is based on a popular movie. It will tour in the UK and Ireland next year. Faye is famous for being in the pop group Steps. She will perform in many cities like Wolverhampton and Manchester. Other actors will play friends in the show too. This is exciting news for fans of the musical and Faye.

questions.question: How many characters will Faye Tozer play in the Mean Girls musical?
What is Faye Tozer famous for?
Where will the Mean Girls musical tour?
Who are the two main characters whose moms Faye will play?
What type of show is Mean Girls based on?
In which city will Faye first perform in the tour?

background_read: Mean Girls is a musical based on a funny movie from 2004 about high school life. It tells the story of a girl named Cady who moves to a new school and meets popular girls called the Plastics. The musical has songs and dances that make the story fun. Faye Tozer is a well-known singer from the group Steps, which had hits in the 1990s. She has also acted in other shows in London. This tour will bring the musical to many theaters so more people can see it.
Article_Structure: WHO: Faye Tozer, a singer and actress from Steps, and other actors like Kiara Dario and Sophie Pourret.
WHAT: Faye will play three roles in the Mean Girls musical tour.
WHERE: The tour will visit the UK and Ireland, including cities like Wolverhampton, Manchester, Canterbury, and Blackpool.
WHY: To entertain audiences with a musical based on the popular Mean Girls movie, featuring Faye's talents.

perspectives.description: This article shares exciting news about a famous performer joining a popular musical, which fans might enjoy.
